item.description: Enjoy a cup of coffee, tea, or whatever your choice of beverage is. It's a great way to meet other members and socialize. Good people and good conversation for a Tuesday night! We only can do a maximum of 8 people since most Starbucks are small for seating a big group. This has been a big hit with everyone in the past so we are going to do this event on a weekly basis from here on out. We may also change Starbucks locations on a weekly basis. Hope to see you all there! Until then have fun and enjoy.
item.name: Starbucks Farmington
